<font size="4">**About me:**</font>\
- Climate science Postdoc at the [University of New South Wales](https://www.unsw.edu.au/research/ccrc)\
- My [CV](files/CV_maurice_huguenin_2023_june.pdf)\

**My education**:\
- Doctor of Philosophy UNSW in Climate Science, Sydney, Australia (2023)\
- Master of Science ETH in Atmospheric and Climate Science, Zurich, Switzerland (2018)\
- Bachelor of Science ETH in Earth Sciences, Zurich, Switzerland (2016)\

**My research interests**:\
Large-scale physical oceanography, ocean-sea ice modelling, internal climate variability and its atmospheric teleconnections, ocean heat content, Central European atmospheric circulation

<br/><br/>
*I pay my respect to the Traditional Owners who have cared for this land, sea and water that I live and work on across Australia. I acknowledge that this land was stolen from them, and that sovereignty has never been ceded. There can be no climate justice without justice for First Nations people.*
